author: cecilecaillol
body:
#### PR description:

Fix for the high pt electron/photon efficiency in the barrel, which was due to hit saturation.
Now the shower shape and calo iso criteria are not applied for objects with a reco pT above 130 GeV.
See the presentation in https://indico.cern.ch/event/995146/

#### PR validation:

Efficiencies and rates checked in Zprime sample, no drop in efficiency anymore and negligible increase in rates.

@cerminar
title: address high-pt efficiency drop in EB EG objects
